alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:50PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette, Dixie and southeastern Taylor Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 249 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Perry to near Steinhatchee to 6 miles west of Manattee Road. Movement was northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Steinhatchee, Perry, Pinland, Tennille, Shamrock, Clara, Cross City Airport, Old Town, Jonesboro, Foley, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Cooks Hammock, Smith, Carbur, Jena, Hines and Eugene. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette
